body_html:
There is another example for v3 fine tune and write .pb file directly. I think we can update code to fit v1, which mean we do not need freeze graph anymore.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py
body_text:
There is another example for v3 fine tune and write .pb file directly. I think we can update code to fit v1, which mean we do not need freeze graph anymore.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py
body:
There is another example for v3 fine tune and write .pb file directly. I think we can update code to fit v1, which mean we do not need freeze graph anymore.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py
